10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:The Prophet said: "Hurry up with the funeral (procession) for if it was good, you are advancing it to good, and if it was evil, then you are taking it off your necks

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الإِسْرَاعِ بِالْجَنَازَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Haste For The Funeral (Procession)
